member.name: M:Themis.Droid.Clock.MonotonicClockDroid.GetNumberOfSecondsSinceDeviceLastBooted
member.summary:
Not casting to DateTime of .net since it is too much coupled with Gregorian calendar and might suffer from irregularities of human readable date interpretation
Note: milliseconds or nanoseconds precision is available via platform API still, the app usually uses second precision
member.returns: Number of seconds since 1 jan 1970 UTC
